topic.title: Teams
topic.p: Within organizations, you can create teams for grouping users around dedicated projects. This lets you:

list.li: Combine several projects under a single team to provide a convenient way for navigation
Share specific projects among Qodana Cloud users that are part of a team

topic.p: To navigate to an organization, expand the list of organizations in the left corner of the Qodana Cloud UI, and then click the required organization.

chapter.title: Create a team
chapter.p: You can create teams only outside your private organization.

step.p: On the organization page, click Create team in the upper-right corner.
This will open the New team window.
In the New team window, specify the team name and click Create team.

chapter.title: Navigate to teams
chapter.p: You can navigate to a team clicking its name on an organization page, or using the left sidebar of the Qodana Cloud UI.

chapter.title: Manage teams
chapter.p: After clicking in the upper-right corner, you can invite new members to a team, leave the team, or delete it.
Click Invite members to invite or delete members, or change user roles for the existing members.
